name: Maokiji
description:
Warning: It's my first game ever made
Maokiji is a turn-based RPG game. Please be aware there could be some changes while I still develop the game.
Any feedback is greatly appreciated. Please if you know that any of the features can be fixed or improved let me know.
I am working on the game still so I have some plans in the future to change the game completely.

Controls:
* Controller not fully supported

W A S D for the movement

ALT / Right Click : Open -- Close Menu

Left Click: Interact with NPC - Pick up the items

Space: Open Shop Menu with ShopKeeper

Story:
Maokiji is a warrior accompanied by his old friend Grooty. The world is no longer a peaceful place as it was before.
Monsters are crawling around caves led by three Dragon Leaders.
To save the world you need to challenge all 3 dragons and beat them once for all!

What can I play in this amazing RPG game!

You got 3 zones. The first cave to explore is to get you started. Take materials as a reward from bosses and sell them to vendors in Town.
You can upgrade your gear by visiting the store in the main town. Also, you can recover your health by talking with the guy in INN.
INN is located right next to the store!
You can level up to level 100! Each level gives different attribute bonuses.

Installation Guide

Extract maokiji.rar on your computer - Start Maokiji.exe and that's it. Play the game!
